changeSet.author: jesusr
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO cp_upstream_consumer (id, uuid, name, owner_id, type_id) SELECT ir.id, ir.upstream_id, ir.upstream_name, ir.owner_id, ct.id FROM cp_import_record ir, cp_consumer_type ct WHERE ct.label = ir.upstream_type AND ir.status = 0;

changeSet.author: jesusr
changeSet.sql: UPDATE cp_owner o SET upstream_id = (SELECT uc.id FROM cp_upstream_consumer uc WHERE uc.owner_id = o.id);
